publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2408Aileen Campbell:Death of Dr Levy Mwanawasa, President of Zambiaâ€”That the Parliament expresses its condolences to the people of Zambia and particularly the family of its President, Dr Levy Patrick Mwanawasa, following his death on 19 August 2008; notes his efforts to tackle corruption and promote democracy within Zambia and his principled stance against violence in Zimbabwe, and hopes that his legacy will promote stability, democracy and peace in Zambia and across Africa. Supported by: Ian McKee*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*, John Lamont*, Keith Brown*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Elaine Smith*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Mike Pringle*, Bashir Ahmad*, Alasdair Allan*, Jack McConnell*, Gil Paterson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2408 Death of Dr Levy Mwanawasa, President of Zambia (lodged on 20 August 2008) Cathy Peattie*, Des McNulty*, Bob Doris*
S3M-2408 Death of Dr Levy Mwanawasa, President of Zambia (lodged on 20 August 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2408 Death of Dr Levy Mwanawasa, President of Zambia (lodged on 20 August 2008) David Stewart*, Rhoda Grant*
